Label.en: Regardless, what do you think of the tone of the painting?
Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, que penses-tu de l'esprit général du tableau ?
Label.es: Regardless, what do you think of the tone of the painting?
Label.zh: Regardless, what do you think of the tone of the painting?

Label.en: Is the man on the left's smile playful, or cruel?
Label.fr: Le sourire de l'homme de gauche est-il joueur ou cruel ?
Label.es: Is the man on the left's smile playful, or cruel?
Label.zh: Is the man on the left's smile playful, or cruel?

Label.en: Are we sharing a joke? Or accomplices to a crime?
Label.fr: Partageons-nous une plaisanterie ? Sommes-nous complices d'un crime ?
Label.es: Are we sharing a joke? Or accomplices to a crime?
Label.zh: Are we sharing a joke? Or accomplices to a crime?

Label.en: It's questions like this that make me love art!
Label.fr: C'est le genre de questions qui me chatouille les plumes quand je regarde une oeuvre d'art !
Label.es: It's questions like this that make me love art!
Label.zh: It's questions like this that make me love art!
